question: I have a sequelize X.hasMany(Y) How do I make the foreign key non nullable and CASCADE (and what does CASCADE mean here)?
rules: provides a code similar to ```X.hasMany(Y, { foreignKey: { allowNull: false }, onDelete: "CASCADE" });```
explains that "CASCADE" means that if an `X` entry is deleted, all related `Y` entries will be deleted as well

question: What was the issue with the recent deploy of Google Drive connector?
rules: mentions that Google Drive 'connect' button in Managed Data source showed a nango.dev login popin
mentions that it prevented users from connecting their Google Drive Managed data source
mentions that this was due to eventual consistency issues with the secret manager that delayed the successful retrieval of a secret
mentions that the issue was resolved by deploying the front-end service again
